ext.hybridldap.auth-desc: Hybrid authentication and authorization against LDAP resourcese
ext.hybridldap.configuration-error: LDAP configuration error. Please contact your system administrator.
ext.hybridldap.auth.credential-error: Could not authenticate credentials against LDAP domain "$1".
ext.hybridldap.auth.userinfo-error: Could not fetch required user info to complete LDAP login.
ext.hybridldap.map.not-linking: Found local user, but can not verify match. Please login locally and match your attributes, or register a new user with matching attributes.
ext.hybridldap.map.not-creating: Could not find local user to map to and creation is disabled.
apihelp-ext.hybridldap.unlink-summary: Unlink LDAP user from MediaWiki user
apihelp-ext.hybridldap.unlink-extended-d: This API can be called to unlink the LDAP <-> MediaWiki user mapping for a given LDAP user.
